Text:
On a day while the world is engulfed in the joy of
the New Year, the Seven Shadows each enjoy their
New Year's break. However...
Why...? What's going on...?!

(Lately, no matter how I arrange them, they just
don't feel right...)

(Am I lacking volume? No, the quantity and shape
should be perfect... Yet, why don't they feel as
impactful?)

Ah, it's so cold. Nothing beats a heated table
during New Year'sâ€”

Huh, it's just you here, Epsilon? Where are the
others?

...Master Shadow is busy with family matters.
Lady Alpha went somewhere with Delta, and
the others have their own engagements...

Hmm... Busy times for everyone during the New Year,
huh?

Well, I get the heated table all to myself then. Ahh,
this gentle warmth... This is what happiness is all
about...
...*sigh*

What's with the heavy sigh, Epsilon? You're ruining
my New Year vibes.
I-It's nothing.
You sure? Well, if you say so.

Anyway, why not have some red bean soup? It's good
for lifting your spirit when you're feeling down.
And make some for me too while you're at it.
Seriously? You just want some for yourself.

But...alright. I was getting hungry anyway.
I'll make some.

(...Rice cakes are so strange. They puff up so
much when you grill them...)

(I remember when eating the kagami rice cake,
I thought about using it as a substitute for
slime...)

(It didn't work out, though. Regular rice cakes are
far from ideal. They need to be softer, more elastic,
with a certain texture...)
It should have that bouncy feel to it, right?
Exactly, bouncy and jigglyâ€”

...Wait, Zeta?! Weren't you curled up under the
heated table...?

Thought it was about time it'd be ready. Just in
case, let mine cool off a bit, please.
...Were you reading my mind just now?
No way, I can't do that. I'm not Master Shadow.

R-Right, of course. We were talking about rice cakes,
yes! Look! They're almost ready!

Whoa, looks deliciously grilled. If ordinary rice
cakes are this good, the legendary rice cake
must be amazing.
Legendary rice cake...?

You don't know? It's this rice cake called "Heart's
Bounty".

Never heard of it... What's so legendary about it?
Is it super tasty or something?
Well, it probably tastes delicious, no?

Perfect in softness, stretch, bounce, and
elasticity... If it's all that, it must be good,
I guess.
Softness...bounce, and elasticity...?!
Th-That's it!
Huh?

(I might be able to use that rice cake as a reference
for my slime body... In fact, I'm sure of it!)

Zeta! Tell me more about this "Heart's Bounty"!
Where can I find it?!
...I didn't know you were such a foodie, Epsilon.
It's not for eating! Come on, tell me where it is!

What will you use it for if not to eat it...? Sorry,
but I don't know exactly where it is either.

Anything you recall would help! You're my only hope
right now, Zeta!

Alright, alright. I'm not keeping it a secret,
and you don't have to beg. I'll tell you.
Zeta...thank you!

It's not like I have any confirmed intel either.
I just have a hunch.
That's fine! Tell me about your hunch!

...The Great Ize Shrine. The therianthrope shrine
Lady Alpha and Delta went to before.
